content.raw: @scpeters the bug with DART 4.0 force torque integration test failure is unrelated to issue #940, and might deserve its own issue?
content.html: @scpeters the bug with DART 4.0 force torque integration test failure is unrelated to issue #940, and might deserve its own issue?

content.raw:
INTEGRATION_joint_force_torque is fixed by [fixing bug on DART side](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/commit/35f8fdf9f998dbf598fb6f25b110b07e5f4a0621). These tests are enabled in my repo.

Will test REGRESSION_940_force_torque_sensor_frame.
content.html:
INTEGRATION_joint_force_torque is fixed by fixing bug on DART side. These tests are enabled in my repo.

Will test REGRESSION_940_force_torque_sensor_frame.

content.raw: 940_force_torque_sensor_frame.cc are not in [gazebo_3.0_dart_4.0 branch](#!/osrf/gazebo/branch/gazebo_3.0_dart_4.0). Should I wait for pull request #1113 to test REGRESSION_940_force_torque_sensor_frame?
content.html: 940_force_torque_sensor_frame.cc are not in gazebo_3.0_dart_4.0 branch. Should I wait for pull request #1113 to test REGRESSION_940_force_torque_sensor_frame?
